DNA Alignment Problem
=====================


Test Case 1
-----------
Seq1: smith
Seq2: smyth

Result:
Edit Distance: 1
Alignment1: smith
Alignment2: smyth


Test Case 2
------------
Seq1: kittens
Seq2: sittin

Result:
Edit Distance: 3
Alignment1: kittens
Alignment2: sittin-


Test Case 3
-----------
Seq1: attcgccaggt
Seq2: aatcgcgatgg

Result:
Edit Distance: 4
Alignment1: attcgcca-ggt
Alignment2: aatcgcgatgg-


Test Case 4  (Compare DNA for Section of Opsin Gene between Human & Howler Monkey)
-----------
Seq1: TGTATGGACAGGCCACGTCTTGATTATCCACTCATCTGCTCCTGGACTTCTGGGTTGCTTCTACCATTTGCCCCTGTTGGGAAGAGTGCTCTGTATTCATACGGGTTTTTGTGTGGACACACGTTTCAATTCTCTTGGGTACACAGGCGTGGATGTGCAGGAGTCAGGGAAAAAAGCTCACTGGTGCCACTGGGCATCAAGCCCAGCTTCCTAGGCTGCGAATGGGCAGGTCTGCGGCCAGGACTCGTCTTCTTTTCCACGTGGGGCCCCTAGCTTGGCACCTAGCACGTGGC
Seq2: TGTACAGACAGGCCACTTTTTACCCACTCATCTGCTTCTGGACTTTTGGGTTGCTTCTACCATGTGGCCTGTTGGGAACAGTGCTCTGTTTGTATTCATGTACGGGTTTTTGTGTGGACACACATTTTCAAGTCTCTTGGGTACACAGGTGTAGAAGTGCCAGAGTTGGGGAAAAAGCTCACCTTTCTAGGCTGTGAATGGGCCCTGGCAAGTCTGTGGCCAGGACTCGTCTTCTCTTCCACATGGGGCCCCTAGCTTGGCACCTAGCACGTGGC

Result:
Edit Distance: 62
Alignment1: TGTATGGACAGGCCACGTCTTGATTATCCACTCATCTGCTCCTGGACTTCTGGGTTGCTTCTACCATTTGCCCCTGTTGGGAAGAGTGCTCTGT----ATTCAT--ACGGGTTTTTGTGTGGACACACGTTT-CAATTCTCTTGGGTACACAGGCGTGGATGTGC-AGGAGTCAGGGAAAAAAGCTCAC-TGGTGCCACTGGGCATCAAGCCCAGCTTCCTAGGCTGCGAATGGGCAGGTCTGCGGCCAGGACTCGTCTTCTTTTCCACGTGGGGCCCCTAGCTTGGCACCTAGCACGTGGC
Alignment2: TGTACAGACAGGCCAC-T-TT--TTACCCACTCATCTGCTTCTGGACTTTTGGGTTGCTTCTACCATGTGGCC-TGTTGGGAACAGTGCTCTGTTTGTATTCATGTACGGGTTTTTGTGTGGACACACATTTTCAAGTCTCTTGGGTACACAGGTGTAGAAGTGCCAG-AGTTGGGGAAAAA-GCTCACCTT-T-CTA--GG-C-TGT-GA--A--TG----GGCC-C---TGG-CAAGTCTGTGGCCAGGACTCGTCTTCTCTTCCACATGGGGCCCCTAGCTTGGCACCTAGCACGTGGC
